translation.Name: Easter Desktop #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: How's it goin Hun! I haven't heard from you in a while.
translation.I'm: getting a little worried about you; I finally have something interesting to tell you though!
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: We bought loads of weapons - trunks of them - and they're being hauled over on a freight ship. They got ordered with specialized padlocks, so we have a universal master key that can open any of the lockers.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: Funny thing though, I lost it. Not even kidding, it's completely out of sight. No where to be found. I bet that doesn't sound one bit strange to you though, Ha.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_5: Luckily, our buddies down at Station Charlie near Rano Kau have a spare key. So as long as we can get it, we'll be first ones to test some of the experimental weapons. Just have to wait until that shipment arrives. It's a day or two late, so lucky for us, we still have a chance to get first dibs.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_6: I know you get a little uncomfortable when I'm so enthusiastic about killer death machines though, so I'll spare you the rest of the details :S
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_7: Anyways, I'm back on patrol. I'll talk to you tommorow, honey.
